LiquidRichText.Text: Read the situations and write sentences with I think / I don’t think… should…
1. Peter and Judy are planning to get married. You think it’s a bad idea.
I don’t think they should get married.
2. You don’t like smoking, especially in restaurants.

ComboBoxItem.Content: think smoking should be banned, especially in restaurants
don't think smoking should be banned, especially in restaurants

LiquidRichText.Text: 3. I have a very bad cold but I plan ti go out this evening. You don’t think this is a good

ComboBoxItem.Content: I think you should go out this evening
I don't think you should go out this evening

LiquidRichText.Text: 4. You are fed up with the boss. You think he has made too many mistakes.

ComboBoxItem.Content: I think the boss should resign
I don't think the boss should resign
